text: Kadalora Kattu is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Jomon, starring Suresh Gopi and Manoj K. Jayan in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Sukumari * Suresh Gopi as Balan * Manoj K Jayan as Babychan * KPAC Lalitha * Chithra as Cicely * Jagannadhan * Kunchan Maathu as Jayanthi * Mohan Jose * Sabitha Anand * Saikumar as Vijayan * Vijayaraghavan as ponnappan * Rajan P Dev * Thampi Kannanthanam ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Kadalora Kattu
